For those who have serious issues...and I don't just mean with the torrent!
TvT hasn't brought you as 'bad file' or anything of the sort!!
Windows can't handle it when you have really long names of files and especially if they are in long named folders..it gets too many and then windows wont play ball. It likely wont tell you what the problem is either so you have to just work it out by renaming the folder above the one the file is in...or the folder above that first...rename them to single letter names to start with.
Then go into the folder the film is in and select it, then press F2 then type a new name for the movie file.
If, as some say here, you CANNOT rename it (and you have done the renaming of folders it is in) then it is because windows has locked the file...it being a movie file. In that case get 'Unlocker' google it, and then right click on the damn movie file and choose..Unlocker, then choose RENAME. It will be done!
Hooraaaay!!!
